title: modern house for sale in Kengalla Kandy
details: A spacious modern house located 5 minutes drive from Kengalla town. Approximately 20 minutes travel time to Kandy. Plenty of space for parking . The house is with 39 perch land and it contains a large verandah, car porch, 2 large bed rooms, bath room with hot water, servant’s toilet, large living room, dinning room, store room and a kitchen. Fully tiled. Rs.15 million.
